title: Are Geofence Warrants Sweeping Up Your Cellphone Data?
itunes:title: Are Geofence Warrants Sweeping Up Your Cellphone Data?
description:
Ari Ezra Waldman, a professor of law and computer science at Northeastern University Law School, discusses the spike in police use of geofence warrants to get location records for all mobile devices within a virtual perimeter. His new book is, "Industry Unbound: The Inside Story of Privacy, Data and Corporate Power."

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
